A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So unbelievably disappointed with TLJ. Yeah it was full of excitement\, battles\, storylines\, but none of the storylines were good. Also\, why in the world would you reduce millions of people's childhood character hero to a feeble loser? So much emotion was tied up in Luke Skywalker and it was tossed away with a force projection demise? Very weak. It seems the last Jedi is really dead with this film. Be ashamed\, Rian Johnson...
